TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CompletedEventHandler(object sender, CompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The instance of the object for which to invoke this method.
The that specifies the reason the event was invoked.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example calls a method asynchronously. The **Win32_Process.Create** method is called to create a new process for Calc.exe.
